channel.title: Need help with my auto cache downloader!
channel.description:
Hey guys i'm new to moparscape. this is my first post, so
i'm like leeched TrisidaX server and coded few things added new models and etc., than later i wanted to put it online so first thing i do is change my cache download link so poeple would get my new cache with new models in it, so I put it on dropbox.com the edited cache and download link is correct as i guess (http://dl.dropbox.com/s/zgvp8mb2kanv...idiaXCache.zip) i change settings in my client.java and autoCacheDownloader.java to download this so i compile and rune the client, so client downloads it well but when it starts unpacking the cache it gives me this error, ......
Jumava is loading.. java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInsta nce0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInsta nce(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newI nstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run( Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run( Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...xception(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...Stream(Unknown So urce) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4918) at client.startUp(client.java:9387) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6303) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Un known Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress( Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...Client(Unknown Source) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...onnect(Unknown Sour ce) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...onnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...Stream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConn...rField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknow n Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error
...and as the begginer i realy don't know what it means, but than i decided to look what did he download in my c disk and i open up .TrisidiaXCache and there is some main file cache files unziped and Cache.zip and inside the cache.zip there is the .TrisidiaXCache and i'm kinda like wtf...
Please help i'm like FML at the moment. and i'm looking thro all kinds of tutorials lately for this stuff but can't find similar to this, and any help would be thankfull

item.title: Need help with my auto cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I don"t think that will work since trisidax will have the necesarry anti leech added.

But if u want to try

Go into ur singlink.java and search for something like this

Change that into

Now go into ur cachedownloader and change the download link to ur new uploaded cache (Make sure to upload the zip version of .your_server_name_cache)

This must work

Read full topic

@lmfao_beat wrote:

Hey guys i’m new to moparscape. this is my first post, so

i’m like leeched TrisidaX server and coded few things added new models and etc., than later i wanted to put it online so first thing i do is change my cache download link so poeple would get my new cache with new models in it, so I put it on dropbox.com the edited cache and download link is correct as i guess (http://dl.dropbox.com/s/zgvp8mb2kanv...idiaXCache.zip) i change settings in my client.java and autoCacheDownloader.java to download this so i compile and rune the client, so client downloads it well but when it starts unpacking the cache it gives me this error, …
